com.deezer.sdk.player

Class TrackPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractPlayerWrapper
      • com.deezer.sdk.player.TrackPlayer

  • public class TrackPlayer
extends AbstractPlayerWrapper
    A PlayerWrapper used to play Deezer Tracks

    A TrackPlayer can be launched very easily using the following code : 

     
      TrackPlayer trackPlayer = new TrackPlayer(application, deezerConnect, new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker());
      trackPlayer.addPlayerListener(listener);
      trackPlayer.playTrack(trackId);
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackPlayer

        public TrackPlayer(android.app.Application application,
           DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
           NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
            throws OAuthException,
                   TooManyPlayersExceptions,
                   DeezerError
        Creates an autonomous TrackPlayer. No parameter can be null
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object initialised to be used with Deezer Radio
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        OAuthException - if the deezerConnect's token is not valid
        TooManyPlayersExceptions
        DeezerError - if deezerConnect is not properly initialized
